Major Characters

Start Here

This character compendium has three parts.

  • Age and Species Comparison contains a chart speaking to each species each major character is, when they were born and what age they were in certain key years. You can click on each character's name in the table to be taken to their description.
  • Brief Character Descriptions has a description of each major character, their physical description and some key traits involved with their character and their state as of January 1, 2285 (the start of the core story)
  • Character Location Timeline is a set of charts that shows which orbital body each character is at or near during different parts of the story.

Back to Top ↑

Age and Species Comparison

This section of the compendium is for the characters of multiple species around the universe.

This table has a character's name, species, birth year, and age at some key years throughout the story.

Character Species Birth Year 2285 2306 Other Years
Timothy Li Human 2265 20 41 2274 (9)
Samuel Knudsen Human 2262 23 44 2272 (10), 2278 (16)
Gwendolyn Romulus Human 2264 21 42 2276 (12)
Jamie Hedlund Human 2266 19 40 2280 (14)
Cassandra Fulton Human 2258 27 48 2271 (13), 2273 (15)
Serafín Vera'Cruz Human 2253 32 53
Alestra Amalee Human 2257 28 49 2271 (14)
Jaedon Beyar Human 2250 35 56
Andrew Pace Human 2254 31 52
Allorien Crysix 1910 375 396 1990 (88)
Fae Crysix 1947 338 359 2035 (88)

Brief Character Descriptions

Humans

Timothy Li
  • Born: Taito City, Tokyo, Terra Firma Empire
  • Pronouns: he/him/his
  • January 1, 2285: 20, political prisoner, lost boy, trusting.
  • Physical Description: Usually dressed in casual clothing, Tim has dark brown hair, brown eyes and olive skin.
Samuel Knudsen
  • Born: Denver, Colorado, Terra Firma Empire
  • Pronouns: he/him/his
  • January 1, 2285: 23, political prisoner, unaware, living each day separately.
  • Physical Description: Usually dressed in dark clothes, Sam, keeps his black hair long over one of his blue eyes.
Gwendolyn Romulus
  • Born: Avalon Castle, Avalon, Planet of Venus, Republic of Venus
  • Pronouns: she/her/hers
  • January 1, 2285: 21, Princess of Venus, political prisoner, dedicated, unfocused, unwilling.
  • Physical Description: Usually wearing looser fitting clothing with long auburn hair and blue eyes she carries herself with an air of nobility.
Jamie Hedlund
  • Born: Planum Castle, Martian South Pole, Mars, Terra Firma Empire
  • Pronouns: he/him/his
  • January 1, 2285: 21, Princess of Venus, political prisoner, dedicated, unfocused, unwilling.
  • Physical Description: Usually wearing looser fitting clothing with long blonde hair and blue eyes she carries herself with an air of nobility.
Cassandra Fulton
  • Born: Midtown Manhattan, New York City, Terra Firma Empire
  • Pronouns: she/her/hers
  • January 1, 2285: 26, Daughter of Terra Firma's Chancellor, chaos agent, loner, strategic mind.
  • Physical Description: Hair of purple so dark it looks black in low lighting. Black eyes. Chaotic clothing choices with little regard to how they look or how much they cover of her.
Serafín Vera'Cruz
  • Born: León, Mexico, Terra Firma Empire
  • Pronouns: he/him/his
  • January 1, 2285: 32, Special Advisor to the Chancellor of Terra Firma, empathetic, straightforward, confident.
  • Physical Description: Always wearing an impeccably tailored suit to fit expectations, but looking uncomfortable in them Serafín keeps his light brown hair cropped and his brown eyes open at all times.
Alestra Amalee
  • Born: Soho, London, England, Terra Firma Empire
  • Pronouns: she/her/hers
  • January 1, 2285: 28, master thief, highly trained, former Terra Firma special forces agent.
  • Physical Description:
Jaedon Beyar
  • Born: Van, Van Province, Turkey, Terra Firma Empire
  • Pronouns: he/him/his
  • January 1, 2285: 35, Venusian special forces agent, military commander, mentor, teacher.
  • Physical Description:
Andrew Pace
  • Born: Kado, Nova City, Union of Pluto, Venusian Republic
  • Pronouns: he/him/his
  • January 1, 2285: 31, Junior Senator from Pluto in Venusian Congress, understanding, thoughtful, principled, secretive.
  • Physical Description:

Crysix

Allorien
  • Born: Kurrim Cross City, Eblypso
  • Pronouns: they/he
  • January 1, 2285: 375, Senior Watcher of Humanity, hoping humanity will contact him, compassionate, ready, bending the rules.
  • Physical Description:
Fae
  • Born: Kurrim Cross City, Eblypso
  • Pronouns: he/him/his
  • January 1, 2285: 338, Junior Watcher of Humanity, strict, rule follower, thinks humanity is immature.
  • Physical Description:
